name: Marathon (Beck)
description:
Marathon is a 2D, retro-style stealth game created for the Global Game Jam 2018.

Objective: Find the key and get through all three levels without being detected to win.

Controls: LEFT/RIGHT to move,  SPACE to jump, UP to open unlocked doors.

Credits:
Art/code - Beck McGowan
Music - Jamesy Downie (https://soundcloud.com/jamesy-downie)
